allow:
Bash(git -C /Users/jankneumann/Coding/agentic-coding-tools commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Update agent-coordinator specs to reflect Phase 1 implementation

Sync spec.md and design.md with actual implemented behavior:
- Add implementation status section tracking Phase 1 completion
- Fix no-tasks response to match actual {success: false} return
- Update MCP tools list organized by implementation phase
- Fix lock acquisition pattern to document INSERT ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
- Update file structure showing implemented vs planned files
- Remove duplicate database tables section

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jankneumann/Coding/agentic-coding-tools commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add update-specs skill for syncing specs with implementation reality

Captures the feedback loop where debugging, testing, and review reveal
spec drift that needs to be reflected back in spec.md, design.md, and
tasks.md files.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
